title: Preparing For Perimenopause: You Don't Have To Do It Alone
description: Perimenopause, the period of transition to menopause, is still a largely misunderstood chapter of reproductive life. It brings about both physical and mental health changes that doctors rarely educate their patients about. We're joined by health correspondent Rhitu Chatterjee to talk about perimenopause, and how to advocate for yourself as you're going through it.

itunes:summary: Though half the population experiences it, perimenopause is still a largely misunderstood chapter of reproductive life.
